segments.text: Is there any ticket left for tonight's concert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , sir.All the tickets have been sold out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a shame . Will there be the same performance tomorrow evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . The only tickets of the same performance available are on 21st .
segments.speaker: S2
